医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学、创新与异种移植：与秦文宁博士的讨论在这次采访中，我们深入探讨了异种移植的先驱世界和基因编辑不断发展的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Science-Innovation-and-Xenotransplantation-A-Discussion-with-Dr-Wenning-Qin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Science-Innovation-and-Xenotransplantation-A-Discussion-with-Dr-Wenning-Qin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=168efa49-ad88-4b77-91c4-5ca7f9fd61a1 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 12:13:00 -0400 Science, Innovation, and Xenotransplantation: A Discussion with Dr. Wenning Qin
工业界和学术界联合支持方酸单酰胺的合成作为药物发现的基础材料全球可持续实验室设备远见者 Asynt 与金斯顿大学（英国伦敦）和全球知名化学产品供应商 Key Organics 合作，开发了一个易于使用的新型合成化合物库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7d681df-ac7b-4d87-8f0d-4c237a444fb7 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 11:40:00 -0400 Industry & academia combine to support synthesis of squaric acid monoamides as building blocks for drug discovery
连接化学和生物学：设计新疗法的艺术在本次采访中，我们深入探讨了索娜·克拉伊科维科娃 (Sona Krajcovicova) 的旅程和研究，探讨了多样化的兴趣如何导致对化学的热情追求、药物开发的创新方法以及对治疗领域产生有意义影响的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Bridging-Chemistry-and-Biology-The-Art-of-Designing-Novel-Therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Bridging-Chemistry-and-Biology-The-Art-of-Designing-Novel-Therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba027c2b-7016-4177-9e1f-672e7ec74276 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 10:40:00 -0400 Bridging Chemistry and Biology: The Art of Designing Novel Therapeutics
研究揭示加盐习惯与2型糖尿病之间的联系最近的一项研究探讨了食物中添加盐与新型 2 型糖尿病 (T2DM) 发病率之间可能存在的相互作用，以了解长期钠摄入量对糖尿病发病率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-uncovers-link- Between-salt-adding-habits-and-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-uncovers-link- Between-salt-adding-habits-and-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2f2843f-8a4d-4f88-ada0-4a6d63673a79 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 10:11:00 -0400 Study uncovers link between salt-adding habits and type 2 diabetes

PacBio 宣布成立 HiFi Solves，这是一个由临床基因组学研究领导者组成的全球联盟PacBio（纳斯达克股票代码：PACB）是高质量、高精度测序解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布成立 HiFi Solves 联盟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/PacBio-announces-HiFi-Solves-a-global-consortium-of-clinical-genomics-research-leaders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/PacBio-announces-HiFi-Solves-a-global-consortium-of-clinical-genomics-research-leaders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c012740c-3ff6-4b57-8245-7764a7a020bf Thu, 02 Nov 2023 09:16:00 -0400 PacBio announces HiFi Solves, a global consortium of clinical genomics research leaders
亲肤心电图传感器提供舒适感，同时不影响心脏护理研究人员优化了可穿戴心电图 (ECG) 贴片的干电极几何形状，以增强其性能以及与用于远程和护理点 (PoC) 诊断的商用心电图监视器的可比性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Skin-friend-ECG-sensor-offers-comfort-without-compromise-on-cardiac-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Skin-Friendly-ECG-sensor-offers-comfort-without-compromise-on-cardiac-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d51094f-0d8e-41e6-9a2b-b633f5379586 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 09:10:00 -0400 Skin-friendly ECG sensor offers comfort without compromise on cardiac care
从恐惧到健身：研究表明锻炼可以缓解非裔美国人的衰老焦虑研究人员研究了中老年非洲裔美国人的衰老焦虑及其四种结构与体力活动（PA）水平和态度之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-fear-to-fitness-study-suggests-exercise-may-ease-aging-anxiety-in-African-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-fear-to-fitness-study-suggests-exercise-may-ease-aging-anxiety-in-African-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b66e82d-d017-4e59-98d8-a68c27126fa8 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 08:42:00 -0400 From fear to fitness: study suggests exercise may ease aging anxiety in African Americans

AZoNetwork 推出 Azthena，您的个人科学助理领先的科学出版商推出了 Azthena，这是一款经过 23 年科学内容培训的人工智能助手。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/AZoNetwork-launches-Azthena-your-personal-scientific-assistant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/AZoNetwork-launches-Azthena-your-personal-scientific-assistant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0b52cc1-8e9d-4ac0-a94e-6f8248698824 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 07:44:00 -0400 AZoNetwork launches Azthena, your personal scientific assistant
